description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A match-3 puzzle game where the player can flip colors to their complimentary  counterparts and shift gems around the board across 50 levels of increasing  difficulty.
description.short: A match-3 puzzle game where the player can flip colors to their complimentary  counterparts and shift gems around the board across 50 levels of increasing  difficulty.
